column2: Generic drug ETF ailing despite political focus on high drug prices NEW YORK
column3: March 3 Calls in the U.S. presidential campaign to cut pharmaceutical prices are not helping to revive a barely two-month-old exchange-traded fund that invests in shares of generic drugmakers.

column2: Amazon drops support for on-device encryption on some Fire tablets SAN FRANCISCO
column3: March 3 Amazon.com Inc. announced it plans to stop supporting on-device encryption for Fire tablets running Fire OS 5
column4: the latest version of its operating system for the gadgets.

column2: FedEx Freight raises concerns over CP bid for Norfolk SouthernUPDATE 1-FedEx Freight raises concerns over CP bid for Norfolk SouthernCP Rail mulls litigation over opposition to Norfolk Southern deal MONTREAL/CHICAGO 3 Canadian Pacific Railway Ltd  said on Wednesday it is looking at all legal options in response to what it described as concerted efforts by certain U.S. railroads to block its proposed merger with Norfolk Southern Corp .  CP Rail mulls litigation over opposition to Norfolk Southern deal MONTREAL/CHICAGO 3 Canadian Pacific Railway Ltd  said on Wednesday it is looking at all legal options in response to what it described as concerted efforts by certain U.S. railroads to block its proposed merger with Norfolk Southern Corp . CHICAGO
column3: March 3 A unit of FedEx Corp  has raised concerns over Canadian Pacific's bid for Norfolk Southern saying it could hurt rail service and lead to higher shipping costs
column4: according to a letter posted by a U.S. federal rail regulator on Thursday.CP Rail mulls litigation over opposition to Norfolk Southern deal MONTREAL/CHICAGO 3 Canadian Pacific Railway Ltd  said on Wednesday it is looking at all legal options in response to what it described as concerted efforts by certain U.S. railroads to block its proposed merger with Norfolk Southern Corp .
